## Return Value

# init(encryptionScheme:)

**Initializer**

Instantiates a new request configuration with the given encryption scheme.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(encryptionScheme: PKEncryptionScheme)
```

## Parameters

- **encryptionScheme**: The encryption scheme to be used in this request. For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKEncryptionScheme].

## Return Value

A newly instantiated configuration object.

## Discussion

After instantiating a configuration object, you must also set its [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration/cardholderName] and [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration/primaryAccountSuffix] properties before using it to create a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPaymentPassViewController] instance.

## Creating a request configuration

- **PKEncryptionScheme**: Encryption schemes.
title: init(encryptionScheme:)
